description: Organizations demand diversity and versatility these days and people that are multi-skilled are high in demand. No matter where you fit in on a project team work will come into play and many organizations are stressing this as an important asset when hiring an individual. A team is a group of people working on a project and every individual in the team has a specific role. There are some abilities that every team player should possess to make teamwork effective and efficient. Knowing how to be an effective team member will help you move up and showcase your leadership abilities. In this ebook you will learn how to be a good teammate by improving your listening, communication, cooperation, flexibility, confidence, negotiation tactics, and conflict resolution skills among many others. Download your guide to working in a group and move one step closer to improving your job.
